episodes.synopsis: Arusu, a regular 11-year-old girl, suddenly finds herself in the Magic Realm. She frees the sprites captured by apprentice witches, Sheila and Eva.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Sheila and Arusu argue nonstop. Arusu, unaware her identity is known and danger is nearing, meets the Ecoo Fairy who grants one wish to children.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Arusu, losing the True Book of Spells, considers returning to the Human Realm, but learns a truth to make her stay. She can’t abide rough flying.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Can Arusu return to the Human Realm via Departure Harbor? She and Eva get the tusk, but are trapped in the Forest of No Return. Sheila comes to help.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Arusu is eagerly pursuing her study of magic when the sprite, Hydra attacks. Angry at Sheila who tries to sacrifice Qoo, Arusu petrifies herself!
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Arusu frees a sprite to save Sheila from the warlocks, but cursed by the sprite with bad luck for life, she meets with a string of mishaps.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Arusu crushes the warlocks who capture sprites. The boy warlock who comforts Arusu, upset at using magic to harm someone, also gets closer to Sheila.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Sigma saves Sheila but gives her surprising advice. To save Arusu and Sheila from “Death’s Gray,” Eva seeks the flower antidote from Black Mountain.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Three witches infiltrate the Warlock Realm. The magic police find them when Arusu cries, “This isn’t true happiness!” Warlock elder Will saves them.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Narrowly saved by Will, the three witches return to the Witch Realm. Grand Master tells Sheila, who knows about the sanctuary, a shocking truth.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Arusu finds herself alone on a ship to the Human Realm. Oddly, it was Sheila’s doing. Suddenly hijacked, Arusu suggests returning to the Witch Realm.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Sheila carries a secret she can’t share with anyone, even Eva. Arusu returns from the Interdimensional Sea with the frail pirate witch, Lennon.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Lennon moves in with the three witches, but Sheila doubts her true identity. Sigma meets a man in jail. Eva tries to get hold of Panyon’s hair.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Magic Realm ruin approaches. Aged witches fall one after another despite Arusu and Eva’s efforts. Warlocks after the True Book of Spells close in.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Arusu is upset after a tough battle. Sheila discovers Lennon’s secret. Atelia orders Arusu to hand over the True Book of Spells. Lennon speaks out.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Arusu and friends desperately restrain Lennon from attacking Atelia but she’s a lit fuse. Sigma exposes Jidan’s true identity. Jidan is taken hostage.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: The massacre of Witch Heaven begins. Lennon and Atelia are caught by the Warlocks. Eva’s magic powers vanish. Arusu sets off for the Warlock Realm!
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Grande’s power is formidable. To save the captives, Arusu tries to give Grande the True Book of Spells. Sigma recalls his father’s savior prophecy.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: The Warlock Realm is destroyed. Eva collapses, with weakened magical powers. Without the magic of light, Arusu feels helpless despite being a savior.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Black magic is invoked. To save the Witch Realm—and Sheila and Eva—from ruin, Arusu seeks a fix from the Human Realm. Can she find the magic of light?
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Arusu moves in with Sheila and Eva. After drinking soup made from a recipe book borrowed from the mobile magic library, the girls begin to change.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: A Gameli is born before the eyes of lazy witches Mileth and Miletis. Left with no choice they try to raise it, but end up seeking Sheila’s help.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Arusu and friends visit the history museum. The Grand Master appears before the seven-color fountain telling of a brutal, sad battle 200 years ago.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Eva, a misfit at the witch school, has only dragons to talk to. Can Eva alone save the Witch Realm from its greatest threat? How Sheila and Eva met.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Paparo and friends are lured into the mirror image Human Realm by Tohma. Arusu loses her magical powers too. A Tohma look-alike witch then appears.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Legendary sprite Gugu appears once every several hundred years, and has a horrific stomachache. To save Gugu, Arusu and friends head . . . where?!
episodes.title: Episode 26

video.title: Tweeny Witches
video.synopsis: A regular schoolgirl with a passion for magic buries herself in the world of witchcraft and befriends her fellow trainee witches.
